CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 30, 1954, pg. 1, reads: "Among the Homeless - Mrs. Mattie Salon and six children are also among those hapless home owners on North Murtland Street, who saw a $28,000 fire leave their new venture in home ownership a smoldering ruin last Saturday morning. The family formerly lived at 1504 N. Murtland Street. Mrs. Salmon and five of her family are shown above.  Front row, left to right: Susie and Sadie Salmon.  Second row: Marjorie Salmon.  Back row, left to right: Amos Louis Jr., Mrs. Salmon and Mary Salmon. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Salmon family after losing their Homewood home on North Murtland Street to fire, including Susie and Sadie in front, and rear: Amos Louis Salmon Jr., Marjorie, Mattie Salmon wearing gingham dress, and Mary, posed in front of wall with scroll and floral patterned wallpaper, another version
